TopicTitle: What's the addon that lets you change the NavBall skin?

Articles.Content:
I've seen a skinned navball in some KSP videos, what addon lets you do that?

TextureReplacer?

If it is, how does one make a skin?

I've been using this: [Making high contrast nav ball!](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/69540-Making-high-contrast-nav-ball%21?p=969741&viewfull=1#post969741)

working for me in 1.0.2
